event.title: established a military camp in Moshi (Neu-Moschi) in August 1893

data.event: Germany established a military camp in Moshi (Neu-Moschi) in August 1893.
The northern line railroad reached Moshi in 1912.

event.title: attained the status of a town in 1956

data.event: Moshi attained the status of a town in 1956.
In 1988, it became a municipality under Tanzanian law, but as of 31 October 2014, the process for submitting its application to become a city was in its final stages.
